suppliers.name: Agrogana
suppliers.specialties: Roses, Ranunculus, Dainty stems, Custom combo boxes
suppliers.limitations: No hydrangea, carnations, or mums · Very limited greenery
suppliers.notes: First stop — cheapest option. Consolidating all fresh stems here reduces freight. Will custom pack combos in bunches as small as 5 stems.

suppliers.name: Elite Farms
suppliers.specialties: Antique Hydrangea, Roses, Spray Roses, Mums, Carnations, Calla Lilies
suppliers.limitations: Confusing minimums · Communication can be slow — confirm early
suppliers.notes: Excellent pricing on antique hydrangea specifically. Want to grow this relationship — prioritize Elite when ordering hydrangea.

suppliers.name: Shaw Lake Greenery
suppliers.limitations: Greenery and garlands ONLY — no fresh flowers
suppliers.notes: Go-to source for all greenery needs and premade garlands.

suppliers.name: Magic Flowers
suppliers.notes: Sole source for all tropical flowers and tropical greenery.

suppliers.name: Mayesh
suppliers.notes: Historical primary wholesaler. Branches across the US — will FedEx orders if no local branch. Use for anything not sourced farm direct.

suppliers.name: DV Flora
suppliers.limitations: Based in NE — factor shipping time
suppliers.notes: Recently started, expanding rapidly. Wonderful to work with. Great for sourcing smaller quantities of hard-to-find items.
